With this gear, you'll be prepared to take on any foe! **Gabriel Belmont Cyclone Boots, Gabriel Belmont Dark Gauntlets and Cross, Gabriel Belmont Upgraded Brotherhood of Light Armor and hoodie ** [#Legal]
